coreContributors.name: Nataly Sandoya
coreContributors.description: She has developed the user interfaces of the main Ecuador In Tech website. She has also developed the artwork for the events that have taken place since the community began, giving it a visual identity.

coreContributors.name: Iv√°n Manzaba
coreContributors.description: He has contributed his knowledge of Git and GitHub as a speaker at the community's first event. He has also actively contributed to the code of the current Ecuador In Tech website and actively helps with community management.

coreContributors.name: Brayen Gavilanez
coreContributors.description: Co-founder, he has contributed with projects, management, and leadership within it. He has managed to connect different actors, expanding its reach.

coreContributors.name: David Cortez
coreContributors.description: Co-founder, he has shaped the community through strategic leadership, collaborative partnerships, and contributions to both code and impactful initiatives.

activeContributors.name: Jhon Merchan
activeContributors.description: He has actively participated, connecting Ecuador In Tech with other leaders and disseminating the activities, expanding the community's network.

valuedContributors.name: Agustina
valuedContributors.description: She has contributed her extensive knowledge as speaker in the Path to Path event series, which consists of several talks designed to support people in their process, offering practical strategies and advice to excel and leave their mark in a competitive sector, regardless of their level of experience or area of expertise.
